title: Google Pixel 3 wireless charging problems revealed – all you need to know
description: ![YouTube on the Google Pixel3]() Credit: @lgbtfeedla ### Twitter gives users more power to report fakers, as purge continues](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/twitter-is-giving-users-more-power-to-report-fake-accounts-as-purge-continues-3613624 "Twitter gives users morepower to report fakers, as purge continues")  * The Pixel Stand sure isn’t cheap at £69 – by way of comparison, a 10W Ankerwireless charging pad [costs just £18 on Amazon](https://amzn.to/2D11je3),albeit with no additional functionality – so this is a pretty nasty secret ifGoogle let it, ahem…stand.**What do you make of the Pixel 3’s apparent wireless charging restrictions?Let us know on Twitter @TrustedReviews.**
